name: Grocery E-commerce UI Kit
description:
[This file is a DEMO file, Get the full version here]


Veggie - Grocery E-commerce UI Kit is modernly crafted Figma wireframe template which can be used to kickstart your iOS Grocery app project. Fasten your workflow when creating app designs with this UI Kit, no need to start from scratch! This template consists of and 30 design screens to make your workflow fast and seamless.


File included

  • Figma file
  • Documentation


Features

  • With Atomic Design System
  • Pixel perfect with soft 8 px grid
  • Exclusively made for Figma
  • Using Google Fonts
  • Organised components
  • Easily change colors with color Styleguide
  • Easily change text style with Typography Styleguide
  • Well organized layers and groups


All images are for preview/ display purpose only and not included in download files.

  • Discover more on tanahairstudio.com
  • Get the full version here
